techmeme.title: Disney says it is "fully integrating" Hulu into Disney+ and plans to launch a "unified" Disney+ and Hulu app in 2026 now that it is Hulu's sole owner (Todd Spangler/Variety)
ESPN plans to launch its new flagship streaming service ESPN on August 21 for $29.99 per month or $35.99 per month when bundled with Disney+ and Hulu (Lillian Rizzo/CNBC)
Shopify reports Q2 revenue up 31% YoY to $2.68B, above $2.55B est., GMV up 30.6% YoY to $87.8B, and forecasts Q3 revenue above est.; SHOP jumps 15%+ pre-market (Reuters)
Uber reports Q2 revenue up 18% YoY to $12.7B, Gross Bookings up 17% YoY to $46.8B, trips up 18% YoY to 3.3B, income up 82% YoY to $1.5B, a $20B share buyback (Financial Times)
Court records: from 2017 to 2022, 400,181 US Uber trips had sexual assault and sexual misconduct reports, far exceeding its public disclosure of 12,522 reports (Emily Steel/New York Times)
